message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I think I can offer you $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more.  How about $110? This gives us both a good deal.
Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering the value of the product, I believe $105 would be a fair price for both of us.
